divs: sighting detailsi was in the house watching tv and my daughter just came home and was still outside when i heard her call for me to come out side and look at what she is looking at. i went outside to see a very larges dark in color triangle with a very bright white light on each cornerand fast blinking white lights (they looked like a sparkler)oddly spaced between the bright white lights. it was about 1\4 mile away and about 400 ft up. the triangle was at an odd angle with the top point at not at the very top and the blinking white lights were between the bright lights and blinking about once every 2 seconds and all not at the same time, much faster than the lights i see flying to the sarasota airport. the craft was about 400 ft up and traveling south toward sarasota about 50 mph. it headed south for 15 minutes. i came in and heard my daughter calling me again and again i went out and found out it had changed direction and began heading northeast. i followed it for another 15 minutes until i lost sight of it as it was too far away to see anymore. it was still traveling at the same slow speed. when i first saw it i thought it was a plane but as i looked at it better with the odd shape and slow speed i knew it could not be. planes cannot fly that slow and helicopters make noise. this thing did not. then i realized it was a ufo. even my wife (a skeptic) saw it and believes it was a ufo. of course at the time i could not find a camera until it was too far away to take
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Bradenton
There were no other sightings in Bradenton on or around January 19th 2011
Summary: large triangle lights on each corner with fast flashing lights at different locations moving very slow 200 ft up no noise
